data.title: New York Magazine
data.meta_description: See an archive of all woody allen stories published on the New York Media network, which includes NYMag, The Cut, Vulture, and Grub Street.
data.text:
in conversation Aug. 5, 2024

Jennifer Tilly Outsmarts Them AllFour decades into her career, the Oscar nominee turned Chucky icon is bringing her cunning stardom to Real Housewives.

the eavesdropper Apr. 11, 2024

The Eavesdropper Goes to Woody Allen’s New Movie[Whispers] “I love Woody Allen.”

Julie Klausner and Tom Scharpling Have Podcast Advice for Alec BaldwinAnd they had Dylan Farrow on Double Threat to dole it out.

why? June 27, 2022

Alec Baldwin Has Taken It Upon Himself to Interview Woody AllenThis seems like a bad idea, but carry on.

authors June 14, 2022

James Patterson Has Apologized For His Thoughts About RacismAgainst [checks notes] older white men who want to be writers.

ugh Jan. 28, 2022

Actors Are Still Bending Over Backward to Defend Woody AllenWallace Shawn wants you to know he’s looked into the sexual-assault allegations, and he doesn’t believe them.

woody allen May 17, 2021

Drew Barrymore Discusses Being ‘Gaslit’ About Woody Allen With Dylan FarrowThe daytime host reflected on her appearance in Allen’s 1996 film Everyone Says I Love You during their interview.

controversy Mar. 29, 2021

Unreleased Woody Allen CBS Sunday Morning Interview to Stream on Paramount+The special, now streaming, was met with criticism over the weekend.

close reads Mar. 8, 2021

Allen v. Farrow’s Dylan Farrow Videos Are a Necessary Shift in FocusWhile it’s unsettling to watch a 7-year-old Dylan describe her abuse, it feels right that as an adult she’s finding healing in an on-camera context.

allen v. farrow Mar. 1, 2021

Dylan Farrow Addresses Allen v. Farrow Video of 7-Year-Old Self Alleging AbuseSunday’s episode contains footage recorded in 1992 of Farrow’s abuse allegations against Woody Allen.

crime Feb. 22, 2021

The Biggest Takeaways From Allen v. FarrowHBO’s new documentary reexamines the sexual-abuse allegations against Woody Allen.

allen v farrow Feb. 22, 2021

Woody Allen, Soon-Yi Previn Denounce HBO’s Allen v. Farrow As ‘Shoddy Hit Piece’Ronan Farrow kept the focus on his sister in a post following Sunday’s premiere.

tv review Feb. 19, 2021

Allen v. Farrow Places Dylan Farrow at the Center of Her Own StoryThe new HBO docuseries reexamines the familiar allegations against Woody Allen from a different perspective with context we have not seen before.

trailer mix Feb. 16, 2021

Mia Farrow Wishes She ‘Never Met’ Woody Allen in HBO’s Allen v. Farrow TrailerThe docuseries will feature new interviews and video footage.

regrets Sept. 14, 2020

Kate Winslet Now ‘Regrets’ Working With Woody Allen and Roman PolanskiShe reiterated her feelings in a new interview.

apologies June 13, 2020

Spike Lee Apologizes for Defending Woody Allen“My words were wrong.”

close reads Apr. 22, 2020

I Read Woody Allen’s Memoir So You Don’t Have ToFirst off, there are two short passages that will forever change the way I think about him. I cannot unread, unhear, unknow them. I wish I could.

stop and chat about this Apr. 4, 2020

Larry David Doesn’t Think Woody Allen ‘Did Anything Wrong’ After Reading Memoir“It’s a fantastic book, so funny.”

Everything We Learned From Woody Allen’s Controversial MemoirFrom his affair with Soon-Yi to the molestation allegation.

Publishing Staff Walk Out to Protest Woody Allen AutobiographyAt Hachette, which is set to publish the book in April, employees have walked out in solidarity with Dylan and Ronan Farrow.

books Mar. 3, 2020

books Mar. 3, 2020

Ronan Farrow Condemns Publisher of Woody Allen Memoir“It’s wildly unprofessional … for Hachette to behave this way. But it also shows a lack of ethics and compassion for victims of sexual abuse.”

prepare yourself Mar. 2, 2020

Woody Allen’s Autobiography Will Arrive Next MonthHe finally found a publisher.

Scarlett Johansson Admits She ‘Mishandled’ Backlash About Her Transgender Role“To feel like you’re kind of tone-deaf to something is not a good feeling.”

Weinstein Reportedly Looked to Woody Allen for Help Silencing His Accusers“How did you deal with this?” Weinstein asked Allen, according to Ronan Farrow’s book Catch and Kill.

Woody Allen’s Alleged Teen Ex-Girlfriend Shares Her StoryChristina Engelhardt says she was 16 when she met the director — and that over the years she’s come to realize how little agency she had.
